import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./MypageEdit.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import useUserData from'../useUserData';import axios from'axios';import BasicNavbar from'../Navbar/BasicNavbar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MypageEdit(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{name,nickname,birth,id,password,store,setName,setNickname,setBirth,setId,setPassword,setStore,handleSave,fetchUserData}=useUserData();useEffect(()=>{// useUserData.js에서 제공하는 fetchUserData를 호출하여 초기 데이터를 불러옴
fetchUserData();},[]);const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;switch(name){case'nickname':setNickname(value);break;case'password':setPassword(value);break;default:break;}};const handleSaveWrapper=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await handleSave();navigate('/mypage');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"myPageEditAll",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BasicNavbar,{title:"\uD504\uB85C\uD544 \uC218\uC815"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"myPageEdit",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSaveWrapper,className:"userEditForm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC774\uB984",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"\uC774\uB984",value:name,disabled:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uB2C9\uB124\uC784",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"nickname",placeholder:"\uB2C9\uB124\uC784",value:nickname,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uAC00\uAC8C \uC774\uB984",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"store",placeholder:"\uAC00\uAC8C \uC774\uB984",value:store,disabled:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC0DD\uB144\uC6D4\uC77C",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"birth",placeholder:"\uC0DD\uB144\uC6D4\uC77C(8\uC790\uB9AC \uC785\uB825)",value:birth,disabled:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"userEditInfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"a_id",children:["\uC544\uC774\uB514 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uC544\uC774\uB514",value:id,disabled:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"a_pw",children:["\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"centered",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"saveBtn",children:"\uC218\uC815 \uC644\uB8CC"})})]})})]});}export default MypageEdit;
